# Harmony

If you are a researcher in need of harmonizing and comparing questionnaires, check out [Harmony](https://harmonydata.ac.uk/)! This valuable tool can save you time and enhance the quality of your research. It is being developed by a collaborative team from the UK and Brazil (Dr. Hoffmann), and is funded by the Wellcome Trust (Data Prize).

See how it works:

<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cEZppTBj1NI&ab_channel=Harmony>
